code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[name,setName]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();if(password!==confirmPassword){setMessage('Las contraseñas no coinciden');return;}try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,name,password})});const result=await
